author: Muzerelle, Judith and Lefeuvre, Anaı̈s and Antoine, Jean-Yves and Schang, Emmanuel and Maurel, Denis and Villaneau, Jeanne and Eshkol, Iris
title: ANCOR, the first large French speaking corpus of conversational speech annotated in coreference to be freely available (ANCOR, premier corpus de français parlé d'envergure annoté en coréférence et distribué librement) [in French])
